messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package.
What does the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?

The Weekly EasyCard Extreme package offers 40GB of internet (20GB + 20GB from 1am to 9am), 7500 Telenor & PTCL minutes, 200 offnet minutes, and 3500 SMS for Rs. 320 including tax. The package is valid for 7 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package.
How can I activate the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
How do I get the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
The Weekly EasyCard Extreme package can be subscribed to through the Easypaisa App and Retailer Menu for Rs. 370 load price.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package.
Who is eligible for the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Weekly EasyCard Extreme offer.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package.
How long is the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package valid?
What is the validity period of the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package?
For how many days does the Weekly EasyCard Extreme package remain active?
The Weekly EasyCard Extreme package is valid for 7 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
